title: When the device plugged to adapter ,phone is bluffing and not charging after Sometimes
content:
Last night I connected my phone for charging. When I came back to take it, Device was blinking like charging and not charging continuously. I tried switch off and even cleaned both cable , adaptor.

Still I am not able to charge my device fully and it's keep on bluffing
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3 XL
